category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Enable_Legacy_Create
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether the legacy dialog box or the generic dialog box is displayed for the rich client File-New menu command for Item, Folder, and Form objects. If a value is not listed, the new (starting Tc10.1.0) generic dialog is used for that menu command. Valid values are "Item", "Folder" and "Form".
